findings.message: Claims `ManagerAuditContent` has no tests, but `apps/reception/src/components/managerAudit/__tests__/ManagerAuditContent.test.tsx` already exists with multiple coverage cases. This misstates current test baseline.
States `BatchStockCount.test.tsx` has 13 tests; current file has substantially more (`31` `it(...)` cases). Coverage assessment is outdated/inaccurate.

References a required `apps/reception/jest.setup.ts`/`data-cy` testing requirement, but that file does not exist in this package (`apps/reception/jest.config.cjs` is present). This constraint is not grounded in current repo config.
Asserts "all existing entries in Firebase have `user`," which is not provable from code and is internally contradicted by the later risk that older entries may be missing it (`line 217`).
Correctly identifies that `ManagerAuditContent` Stock Variance currently omits `entry.user` while the field is present in the model and rendered elsewhere (`StockManagement`).
